explains: n. 演讲，论述；谈话，交流；话语，语篇
v. 高谈阔论，论述；交谈；<古>说出；<古>演奏出
wordGroup: universe of discourse n. 论域；讨论或辩论的范围

sentences.en: He was hoping for some lively political discourse at the meeting.
sentences.cn: 他希望在会上听到些生动的政治演讲。

sentences.en: Not only do they report on current events but also inform and shape the public discourse.
sentences.cn: 它们不仅报道时事，而且为公众论述提供信息和塑造形象。

sentences.en: Break the tension with smiles and humor to reinforce the idea that this is friendly discourse and that all are working toward a common goal.
sentences.cn: 用微笑和幽默来打破紧张气氛，强调这是段友好的谈话，并且所有人都在朝着共同的目标努力。
